system.description:
You have made a pact for power and also taken the essence of a supernatural being into your body. This has changed you (as you had hoped) in dramatic ways. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Constitution or Intelligence score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20. 
  • You can change your warlock spellcasting ability to Intelligence if you desire. Once made, this choice is permanent.
  • Half your bloodblade levels count as warlock levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.0q5qeigzy5bv2zrq]{Extra Blast} feature.
  • Half your warlock levels count as bloodblade levels for the purpose of the Extra Attack and Sanguine Reach features.
  • If you reduce a creature of of the type associated with your Hemocratic Call with a CR of at least half your character level to 0 hp, you regain warlock spell points equal to your proficiency bonus.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in bloodblade, 3 levels in warlock
